AffiliateTierPayout: Affiliate tier payouts defined for the offer (AffiliateTierPayout)
AffiliateTierRevenue: Affiliate tier revenues defined for the offer (AffiliateTierRevenue)
OfferCategory: Offer categories associated with the offer (OfferCategory)
OfferGroup: Offer groups associated with the offer (OfferGroup)
OfferUrl: Landing pages associated with the offer (OfferUrl)
PayoutGroup: Payout groups defined for the offer (PayoutGroupOffer)
RevenueGroup: Revenue groups defined for the offer (RevenueGroupOffer)
